system.description:
**Primary Energy:** Space 6 (moving objects with force + medium range)  
**Supporting Energy:** Time 3 (duration 10 minutes)  
**Range:** Medium, 60 ft.  
**Duration:** 10 minutes  
**Total Cost:** 9 Energy  
**Action:** Complex weave (2 actions), then action each round to maintain control  
**Weaving Roll:** Space Potential + Space Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery  
**Effect:** Move object up to 500 lbs up to 30 feet per round at medium range. Can use to restrain creature (opposed check: your Space Mastery vs their Athletics). Restrained creature can retry each round (1 success escapes).  
**Saving Throw:** Athletics vs Space Mastery (if restraining creature)  
**Success Scaling:** 0 = fails, 1 = 100 lbs (1 minute), 2 = 500 lbs (full effect), 3 = 1000 lbs (1 hour), 4 = 2000 lbs and can fine manipulate (8 hours)

---
